content.rendered:
Creator Tanuja Chandra

Directed by Tanuja Chandra. Kopal Naithani. Ashish Pandey

Written by Shikhaa Sharma. Tanuja Chandra. Juhi Chaturvedi. Ashish Mehta

Cast Juhi Chawla( Ishi7 episodes, 2022 ). Soha Ali Khan( Saiba7 episodes, 2022 ). Kritika Kamra( Dolly7 episodes, 2022 ). Chaitannya Choudhry( Ranveer (Saiba’s Husband)7 episodes, 2022 ). Shahana Goswami( Zaira7 episodes, 2022 ). Karishma Tanna( Geeta7 episodes, 2022 ). Kavya Trehan( Meher (Zaira’s Asst.)7 episodes, 2022 ). Nisha Jindal( Rekha7 episodes, 2022 ). Bharti Sharma( Manjit Dalal7 episodes, 2022 ). Abhijeet Singh( Sub Inspector Karan Singh7 episodes, 2022 ). Vedant Chibber( Zayn (Saiba’s Son) / …6 episodes, 2022 ). Nitish Kapoor( Aditya6 episodes, 2022 ). Ayesha Jhulka( Meera Yadav5 episodes, 2022 ). Kumkum Jain( Veena / …5 episodes, 2022 ). Jaimini Pathak( Kashi5 episodes, 2022 ). Ariana Dogra(5 episodes, 2022 ). Vibha Chhibber( ACP Madhu4 episodes, 2022 ). Gaurav Dwivedi( Vinayak4 episodes, 2022 ). Abhishek Chauhan( Vihaan4 episodes, 2022 ). Swati Marwal( Anjali4 episodes, 2022 ). Abhijeet Singh( Constable Karan4 episodes, 2022 ). Benjamin Gilani( Baldev4 episodes, 2022 ). Tripta Lakhanpal( Rani4 episodes, 2022 ). Jan Graveson( Emily4 episodes, 2022 ). Vanshika Taparia( Young Ishi4 episodes, 2022 ). Veera Kapur Ee( Lawyer3 episodes, 2022 ). Deepali Jain( Embroiderer 13 episodes, 2022 ). Pankaj Singh Tiwari( Advait2 episodes, 2022 ). Emir Shah( Arjun2 episodes, 2022 ). Vijay Kumar Sharma( Meher’s Father2 episodes, 2022 ). Nikhat Khan( Dr. Verma2 episodes, 2022 ). Srestha Banerjee( Yasmin2 episodes, 2022 ). Rajesh Aggarwal( Satish Yadav (Meera Husband)1 episode, 2022 ). Rajesh Agarwal( Satish Yadav (Meera Husband)1 episode, 2022 ). S.K. Batra( Rajiv1 episode, 2022 ). Laxmi Rawat( Sumiti1 episode, 2022 ). Vijay Meenu( Meher’s Mother1 episode, 2022 ). Gauri Saxena( Radha1 episode, 2022 ). Kulbir Badesron( Dolly’s Mother1 episode, 2022 ). Namrata Senani Garg( Resort Manager1 episode, 2022 ). Anurag Thakur( Minister’s PA1 episode, 2022 ). Mohit Satyanand( Minister1 episode, 2022 ). Jaaved Jaaferi( Shantanu1 episode, 2022 ). Manoj Motiani( Ekant1 episode, 2022 ). Vivek Dutta( Anil1 episode, 2022 ). Pragya Singh Rawat( Zaira’s Maid1 episode, 2022 ). Madhu Kandhari Rajesh( Shiv’s Wife1 episode, 2022 ). Javed Jaffrey(1 episode, 2022 ). Neeraj Vedwal( Head Constable1 episode, 2022)

Language Hindi

Producers Tanuja Chandra. Eesha Danait. Vikram Malhotra. Shikhaa Sharma. Shilpan Vyas Tinu. Antara Banerjee. Naved Farooqui

Production Abundantia Entertainment.

Certificate 18+

Season 1

Episodes 7
